name: The Light (At The End of The Tunnel)
name_original: The Light (At The End of The Tunnel)
description:
Explanation:

This platformer takes place in a sewer. There's a light at the end of the tunnel and you have to replace the bulb. The game consist of 5 levels: Sinking Area, Flip Swap Level, Air Pipe Part, Rotating Puzzle and The Speedrun Rotation.

Link trailer: https://youtu.be/leegvscRpEw

(We made this game in 4 weeks)

Controls:

W = moving forward

A = moving left

D = moving right

S = moving backwards

Space = jump

Shift = run

Mouse = use this to look around
